description:
It was discovered that Perl DBI module incorrectly handled certain inputs.
An attacker could possibly use this issue to execute arbitrary code.
(CVE-2013-7490)

It was discovered that Perl DBI module incorrectly handled certain files.
An attacker could possibly use this issue to expose sensitive information.
(CVE-2014-10401)
title: Perl DBI module vulnerabilities
action: In general, a standard system update will make all the necessary changes.
isummary: Several security issues were fixed in Perl DBI module.
